com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication

Class Converse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.HttpCommunication
      • com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.communication.Converse

  • public class Converse
extends HttpCommunication
    Class for communication with Wit.ai bot through converse request type of Wit.ai HTTP API.
    Since:
    1.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Liavontsi Brechka
    See Also:
    HttpCommunication, HttpCommunicationType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleHttpResponse(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode httpResponse)
      Handles JSON response according to type of bot response (merge - first bot action after a user message, msg - the bot has something to say, action - the bot has something to do or stop - the bot is waiting to proceed).
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode sendHttpRequest(String message)
      Creates query string, final URL for request and proper http connection to make a request to Wit.ai HTTP API.

    • Method Detail

      • sendHttpRequest

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode sendHttpRequest(String message)
                                                        throws IOException
        Creates query string, final URL for request and proper http connection to make a request to Wit.ai HTTP API. As a result, provides resources for reading JSON response.
        Specified by:
        sendHttpRequest in class HttpCommunication
        Parameters:
        message - message provided by user input (May be null).
        Returns:
        JSON response object that is represented as JsonNode.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        JsonNode

      • handleHttpResponse

        public void handleHttpResponse(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode httpResponse)
                        throws IOException
        Handles JSON response according to type of bot response (merge - first bot action after a user message, msg - the bot has something to say, action - the bot has something to do or stop - the bot is waiting to proceed).
        Specified by:
        handleHttpResponse in class HttpCommunication
        Parameters:
        httpResponse - JsonNode object that represents JSON response of sendHttpRequest call.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        JsonNode
